member.name: M:BankAccount.Features.Controllers.AccountController.CreateAccount(BankAccount.Features.Accounts.Create.CreateAccountCommand)
member.summary: Creates a new account based on the provided request data.
member.param: The command containing the necessary information to create the account.
member.returns: Operation result containing the created account data.
member.response: Bad request due to invalid input data.

member.name: M:BankAccount.Features.Controllers.AccountController.UpdateAccount(System.Guid,BankAccount.Features.Accounts.Update.UpdateAccountCommand)
member.summary: Updates an existing account identified by the specified account ID.
member.param: The unique identifier of the account to update.
The command containing updated account data.
member.returns: Operation result indicating whether the update was successful.
member.response: Bad request due to invalid input data.

member.name: M:BankAccount.Features.Controllers.AccountController.DeleteAccount(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes an existing account identified by the specified account ID.
member.param: The unique identifier of the account to delete.
member.returns: Operation result indicating whether the deletion was successful.
member.response: Bad request due to invalid input data.

member.name: M:BankAccount.Features.Controllers.AccountController.GetAccount(System.Guid)
member.summary: Retrieves the details of an account by its unique identifier.
member.param: The unique identifier of the account to retrieve.
member.returns: Operation result containing the account details.
member.response: Bad request due to invalid input data.

member.name: M:BankAccount.Features.Controllers.AccountController.GetAccounts(System.Guid)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of accounts belonging to the specified owner.
member.param: The unique identifier of the owner whose accounts are requested.
member.returns: Operation result containing a list of account details.
member.response: Bad request due to invalid input data.

member.name: M:BankAccount.Features.Controllers.AccountController.CheckAccountExists(System.Guid)
member.summary: Checks whether an account with the specified unique identifier exists.
member.param: The unique identifier of the account to check.
member.returns: Operation result indicating if the account exists (true) or not (false).
member.response: Bad request due to invalid input data.

member.name: M:BankAccount.Features.Controllers.AccountController.PatchAccount(System.Guid,BankAccount.Features.Accounts.Patch.PatchAccountCommand)
member.summary: Partially updates an existing account identified by the specified account ID.
member.param: The unique identifier of the account to update.
The command containing the partial update data.
member.returns: Operation result indicating whether the update was successful.
member.response: Bad request due to invalid input data.

member.name: M:BankAccount.Features.Controllers.AccountController.GetAccountStatement(System.Guid,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Retrieves the account statement (list of transactions) for a specified account within a date range.
member.param: The unique identifier of the account.
Start date of the statement period.
End date of the statement period.
member.returns: Operation result containing a list of transactions.
member.response: Bad request due to invalid input data.

members.member:
Registers a new transaction for the specified account.
The unique identifier of the account for which the transaction is registered. The transaction details to register. Boolean indicating whether the transaction was registered successfully. Transaction registered successfully. Bad request due to invalid input data. Authorization is required. [ProducesResponseType(typeof(bool), StatusCodes.Status200OK)]

member.name: M:BankAccount.Features.Controllers.TransactionController.Transfer(BankAccount.Features.Models.DTOs.TransferDto)
member.summary: Executes a transfer between accounts based on the provided transfer details.
member.param: The transfer data including source, destination, and amount.
member.returns: Operation result indicating whether the transfer was successful.
member.response: Bad request due to invalid input data.

member.name: T:BankAccount.Features.Models.Account
member.summary: Represents a bank account.

member.summary: Unique identifier of the account

member.summary: Identifier of the owner of this account

member.name: P:BankAccount.Features.Models.Account.Type
member.summary: Type of the account (e.g., savings, checking)

member.summary: Currency used by the account

member.name: P:BankAccount.Features.Models.Account.Balance
member.summary: Current balance of the account

member.summary: Optional interest rate applied to the account balance

member.name: P:BankAccount.Features.Models.Account.OpenDate
member.summary: Date when the account was opened

member.name: P:BankAccount.Features.Models.Account.CloseDate
member.summary: Optional date when the account was closed

member.name: P:BankAccount.Features.Models.Account.Transactions
member.summary: List of transactions associated with this account
